name: aruba-clearpass
label: Aruba ClearPass
description: Aruba ClearPass is a policy management platform that enables businesses to effortlessly onboard new devices, grant varying access levels, and keep their networks secure. Aruba ClearPass connector performs actions like list guest and guest details, list endpoints and endpoint details etc.

fields.title: Server Address
fields.name: host
fields.description: IP address or FQDN of the Aruba ClearPass server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: The client ID from your Aruba API client app definition.

fields.title: Authorization Grant Type
fields.name: auth_grant_type
fields.description: Select the Aruba ClearPass authentication type either Client Secret or Username-Password pair that you will use to access Aruba ClearPass.

Client Secret.title: Client Secret
Client Secret.name: client_secret
Client Secret.description: Client Secret field specify the client secret from your Aruba API client app definition. The client secret is required if the API client definition is not configured as a public client.

Username/Password.title: Username
Username/Password.name: username
Username/Password.description: In the Username field, enter the username to access the Aruba ClearPass server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

Username/Password.title: Password
Username/Password.name: password
Username/Password.description: In the Password field, enter the password to access the Aruba ClearPass server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. 
By default, this option is set as True

operations.title: Get List of Guests
operations.description: Retrieves the collection of all currently managed guest accounts from Aruba ClearPass.

operations.title: Get Guest Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific guest account from Aruba ClearPass based on the Guest ID you have specified.

operations.title: List Endpoint
operations.description: Retrieves the list of all connected endpoints on the Aruba ClearPass network.

operations.title: Get Endpoint Detail
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific endpoint from Aruba ClearPass based on the Endpoint ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Endpoint ID
parameters.name: endpoint_id
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint whose details you want to retrieve from Aruba ClearPass.

operations.title: Update Endpoint Status
operations.description: Updates the status of a specific connected endpoint in the Aruba ClearPass network based on the Endpoint ID and status you have specified.

parameters.title: Endpoint ID
parameters.name: endpoint_id
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint whose status you want to update in the Aruba ClearPass network.

parameters.title: Endpoint Status
parameters.name: endpoint_status
parameters.description: Select the status that you want to update in the specific endpoint in the Aruba ClearPass network. You can choose from the following options: Known, Unknown, or Disabled.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify that description that you want to add while updating the status of the specific endpoint in the Aruba ClearPass network.

operations.title: List Sessions
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all active sessions from the Aruba ClearPass network.

operations.title: Terminate Sessions
operations.description: Terminates an active session in the Aruba ClearPass network based on the Session ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Session ID
parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: The ID of the session that you want to terminate from the Aruba ClearPass network.
